SELECT e.EMP_NO AS empNo, e.EMP_NAME AS empName, e.EMP_PHONE AS empPhone, e.EMP_REGDATE AS empRegdate,
d.DEPT_NAME AS deptName, -- DEPT 테이블 컬럼 s.STATUS AS statusName -- EMP_STATUS.STATUS 컬럼
FROM EMP e LEFT JOIN DEPT d ON e.DEPT_NO = d.DEPT_NO LEFT JOIN EMP_STATUS s ON e.STATUS_NO = s.STATUS_NO
( e.EMP_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR d.DEPT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR s.STATUS LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' )
ORDER BY e.EMP_NO ASC
